entityDeclarations.name: InboundController
entityDeclarations.description: API controller for handling Inbound POST requests and processing them using InboundWebhookParser.

methodDeclarations.name: Index
methodDeclarations.description: Default GET method that returns a View.

methodDeclarations.name: InboundParse
methodDeclarations.description: Process POST requests from Inbound Parse and print received data.
